page.title: 08Survey Of Local Children.
page.content: The survey was done by questionnaire. Most children liked living in the area but would have liked more friends to play with.It is difficult to find enough children of the same age group. There are very few amenities in the area and children mainly go to Royston,Buntingford and Stevenage when they go out. Cereals,Cornflakes and Weetabix,are popular breakfasts with fish and chips being popular for main meals. American made television series are very popular and most children watch over two hours of television a day. Hobbies range from football and other outdoor games to drawing and model making.Some children go to swimming,Judo and Brownies clubs.When asked what they disliked most at school one boy answered{'BIGGER BOYS {PINCHING OUR FOOTBALL'.
